Nova.Avalonia.UI
Table of Contents

Namespace Nova.Avalonia.UI.BarcodeGenerator

Classes

BarcodeErrorEventArgs

Event arguments for failed barcode generation.

BarcodeGeneratedEventArgs

Event arguments for successful barcode generation.

BarcodeGenerator

A templated control that generates and renders various barcode symbologies (QR Code, EAN-13, Code 128, etc.) using the ZXing library. Optimized for performance via BitMatrix/Bitmap caching and supports full accessibility as a semantic Image.

BarcodeGeneratorAutomationPeer

Exposes the BarcodeGenerator to UI automation (accessibility). Defines the control as an "Image" type so screen readers treat it appropriately.

Enums

BarcodeSymbology

Supported barcode formats.

QRErrorCorrectionLevel

Error correction levels for QR codes. Higher levels allow more damage recovery but reduce data capacity.
